attributes.action: help the public with their heating bills by capping the increases of energy to inflation rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am disabled and like the elderly I struggle to heat my home. We are having to decide between heat or food. We should not have to make those kind of decisions. These companies should be forced to cap their increases to the rate of inflation and cut back on the gross dividends paid out to the shareholders
